column2: Dark Emissaries forces at the Mainland!
Dark forces prepare to ravage our Capital to use its power for their own dark and twisted plans.
Through the restoration of the Albion waystones network we have forever weakened the evil in this world.
Dark Emissaries forces to the North!
Dark forces muster to the north prepare the defenses we shall beat them back from the Citadel! We will never fall to thier dark and twisted plans.
Dark Emissaries forces to the South!
Dark forces sighted on the southern shares, their greedy eyes lay on the Isle of Wights
Restoratiom of the Albion waystones is under way and evil begins to tremble as chaos is siphoned from the world.
We have uncovered all the Waystones on Albion, we must rebuild them urgently if the world is to overcome the End Times.
We must uncover the Waystones scattered throughout Albion, though it will attract much evil to this island it is necessary if we are to save this world.
